document.full_text: china's quality inspection agency has ordered nearly half the nation's dairy firms to halt production as part of a campaign to clean up an industry that has been blighted by toxic scandals.
document.title: china halts nearly half dairy producers in quality crackdown
lines_and_colors: china's quality inspection agency has ordered nearly half the nation's dairy firms to halt production as part of a campaign to clean up an industry that has been blighted by toxic scandals.
